On Friday, Oct. 21st, Green Library welcomed data provider representatives from nine different sources at the [Gear Up for Social Science Data Extravaganza](http://library.stanford.edu/projects/gear-research/fall-2016). The event featured data talks, consultations, demos and open labs.
